lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Frank Rich (column, Nov. 24) is right: while all Americans strive to support President Bush and our war effort, Attorney General John Ashcroft's actions needlessly undermine faith in our justice system. No one denies the administration's need to take strong action against our enemies, even to kill them on the battlefield in war.
abstract: Letter from Scott Harshbarger (Common Cause) on Nov 24 Frank Rich column says Atty Gen John Ashcroft is needlessly undermining Americans' faith in justice system; says Ashcroft should be clear that his job is to lead country's law enforcement effort and protect Constitution
